Grill: Turkish Dalston , E8 This backstreet grill has featured in every Time Out Eating&Drinking guide since it opened more than 20 years ago. It's certainly doing something right to... Restaurant: Middle Eastern Farringdon , EC1R Morito is the little sibling of Sam and Samantha Clark's veteran Moro. As with big bro, the cooking blurs the lines between Spanish and Middle Eastern,... The comparison isn't... Tags: Middle Eastern , Lebanese , Booking advisable , Babies and children welcome , Available for hire , Takeaway service , South , Tooting , Budget Comptoir Libanais

Coffeeshop: Turkish Piccadilly , W1 Kahve Dünyasi is a huge coffee bar chain in Turkey, with 200 stores. If you imagine Starbucks melted into a mid-range chocolatier, you're on the right... Grill: Turkish Dalston , N16 One of many Turkish restaurants lining Stoke Newington Road, 19 Numara is a hardy perennial. It's among the strip's more popular joints, and we've yet to... Restaurant: Turkish Islington , N1 Come on Saturday night to witness this place in full swing, behind the enticing window display of dolmas and baklava. There's a queue for tables. Cynics...
